Reference version 0.0.1

tern-package

TLG creation functions

Tables

t_forest_rsp

Response Forest Plot Table

t_forest_tte

Time-to-event Forest Plot Table

t_rsp

Response Table Caclulation Function

t_summarize_variables

Table of Variable Summaries

t_tte

Time to Event Table

chgfbl_table

Wrap data generated from chgfbl_data into rtable format, to create a test result and change from baseline by visit summary table

Plots

g_forest

Forest plot (table + graph)

g_km

Kaplan-Meier Plot using grid plotting

chgfbl_plot

Plotting data generated from chgfbl_data into change from baseline mean plot using ggplot2 and gridExtra

Data Helper Functions

these functions are used by other functions to derive data

glm_results

glm_results(glm_data) data = glm_data

kmplot_survminer_annotate

Statistics from KM estimators and Cox PH modeling

chgfbl_data

Change from Baseline Table Caclulation Function

Utility functions

%needs%

Check if list or data.frame has elements/variables

labels_over_names

return a vector with the variable labels and names if variable labels do not exist

print_np

Helper functions to format rcells for various display

reflow

Helper functions to re-format and reflow long arm/grouping labels by inserting line breaks

wrap_text

return splitted text that fits onto page width

add_labels

re-attach labels to variables

To be Deprecated

The following functions are to be removed in an upcoming tern release

kmplot_survminer

kmplot_survminer

response_table_ADAM

Response Table with ADaM data structure

arm_for_model2

update Function from tm_forestplot.R. Suggest to put function arm_for_model2 in R script for uitility functions re-factor arm variable by input arm.ref and arm.rest
